ETAnalytics Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in ETAnalytics.h

Overview

@class ETAnalytics

Wrapper class for sending WAMA PI Analytic values using a public interface.

+ trackPageView:andTitle:andItem:andSearch:

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track page views within your application.

+ (void)trackPageView:(NSString *)url andTitle:(nullable NSString *)title andItem:(nullable NSString *)item andSearch:(nullable NSString *)search

Parameters

url

a non-nil NSString to identify the location within your app traversed by your customers. For example: com.yourpackage.viewcontrollername
title

a NSString (nil if n/a) to identify the title of the location within your app traversed by your customers. For example: Screen Name
item

a NSString (nil if n/a) to identify an item viewed by your customer. For example: UPC-1234
search

a NSString (nil if n/a) to identify search terms used by your customer. For example: blue jeans.

Discussion

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track page views within your application.

Declared In

ETAnalytics.h

+ trackCartContents:

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track cart contents within your application.

+ (void)trackCartContents:(PICart *_Nonnull)cart

Parameters

cart

a non-nil PICart object containing a cartID and an array of PICartItems

Discussion

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track cart contents within your application.

Declared In

ETAnalytics.h

+ trackCartConversion:

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track cart conversion within your application.

+ (void)trackCartConversion:(PIOrder *_Nonnull)order

Parameters

order

a non-nil PIOrder object representing an order; created from a cart and cart items and “converted” into a sale of some sort

Discussion

Set Web Analytics Mobile Analytics, Track cart conversion within your application.
